Hot Takes No. 1

07 Nov 2022
  1. Mythic Quest is a better show than Ted Lasso. "Quarantine", "Everlight" and flashback episodes like "A Dark Quiet Death" and "Backstory!" don't get the love they deserve.
  2. Microsoft Outlook for the Web is a better product than Gmail. Just as good interface and keyboard shortcuts, more robust extension support and Power Automate makes it killer.
  3. Light VS Code themes are superior to dark themes. I am old.
